original: de la gang zag @115a * //
analyzed: de la gang zag @115a * //
translated: It is impossible for those of sravaka lineage to change

original: nyan thos kyi rigs can gyis dro bar gyur pa dang rtse mo gnyis thob pa ni nyan thos kyi rigs las bzlog nas sangs rgyas kyi rigs su 'gyur bar srid kyi /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi rigs can gyis dro bar gyur pa dang rtse mo gnyis thob pa ni nyan thos kyi rigs las bzlog nas sangs rgyas kyi rigs su 'gyur bar srid kyi /
translated: It is possible that those of sravaka lineage who obtain both heat and peak could change from the sravaka lineage to the buddha lineage.

original: bzod pa thob pa ni de lta bu mi srid do //🔽des bzod pa man chad gsum thob pa ni nyan thos kyi rigs las bzlog ste /
analyzed: bzod pa thob pa ni de lta bu mi srid do // des bzod pa man chad gsum thob pa ni nyan thos kyi rigs las bzlog ste /
translated: But it is impossible that those who obtain the stage of patience could change.

original: rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar srid kyi /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar srid kyi /
translated: It is possible that those who obtain the three stages of heat and so on could change from the sravaka lineage to the pratyekabuddha lineage.

original: 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog thob pa ni de lta bu mi srid do //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog thob pa ni de lta bu mi srid do //
translated: But it is impossible that those who obtain the supreme mundane state could change.

original: rang sangs rgyas bse ru lta bu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs can rnams ni nges par 'byed pa'i chad dang mthun pa bzhi po gang las kyang bzlog tu mi rung ste /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas bse ru lta bu dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs can rnams ni nges par 'byed pa'i chad dang mthun pa bzhi po gang las kyang bzlog tu mi rung ste /
translated: Rhinoceros like pratyekabuddhas and those of the buddha lineage cannot change from any of the four stages that are compatible with the states of patient acceptance and highest mundane state.

original: de gnyis ni g-yo ba dang gsal ba'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi pa kho na la brten te /
analyzed: de gnyis ni g-yo ba dang gsal ba'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi pa kho na la brten te /
translated: Both of these are changeable and clear states and they rely on the fourth absorption alone.

original: rgyun chags kho nar nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams nas bzung ste /
analyzed: rgyun chags kho nar nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams nas bzung ste /
translated: Because they generate the factors conducive to penetrative insight and so on,

original: byang chub kyi bar du skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi bar du skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: up to enlightenment, in a continuous series.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs na spyod pa'i rigs can rnams ni nyan thos dang 'dra bar bzlog tu rung ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs na spyod pa'i rigs can rnams ni nyan thos dang 'dra bar bzlog tu rung ngo //
translated: Those who practice in a group of solitary realizers can be turned away from that path, just like the sravakas.

original: de la theg pa gsum po gang yang rung ba'i rigs can gyis gang zag rnams tshe dang po kho na la sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas te /
analyzed: de la theg pa gsum po gang yang rung ba'i rigs can gyis gang zag rnams tshe dang po kho na la sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas te /
translated: Do those who possess the lineage of any of the three vehicles generate the application of generating the enlightenment mind and so on in their first lifetime,

original: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams bskyed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam skyed par byed pa yod dam zhe na /
analyzed: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams bskyed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam skyed par byed pa yod dam zhe na /
translated: and do they generate the factors conducive to penetrative insight and the arya path?

original: de lta bu ni med de /
analyzed: de lta bu ni med de /
translated: Such is not the case.

original: thams cad pas shin tu myur ba yang dper na sa bon 'debs pa dang lo tog skye ba dang 'bras bu chags pa bzhin du tshe dang po gcig la ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed do //
analyzed: thams cad pas shin tu myur ba yang dper na sa bon 'debs pa dang lo tog skye ba dang 'bras bu chags pa bzhin du tshe dang po gcig la ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed do //
translated: The most rapid of all is like planting a seed, the crop growing, and the fruit ripening: in the first life one produces the roots of virtue that are conducive to liberation.

original: tshe gnyis pa la ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed do //
analyzed: tshe gnyis pa la ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed do //
translated: In the second life one produces the roots of virtue that are conducive to penetration.

original: tshe gsum pa la ni 'phags pa'i lam skyed par byed do //
analyzed: tshe gsum pa la ni 'phags pa'i lam skyed par byed do //
translated: In the third life one produces the noble path.

original: chos nyid 'di la ni rgyud rim gyis 'jug pa dang yongs su smin pa dang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos nyid 'di la ni rgyud rim gyis 'jug pa dang yongs su smin pa dang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this reality, the stream enters gradually, matures, and is liberated.

original: de ltar stobs de dag ni mngon par rtogs pa dang 'dres pa'i lam yin pas na de brtan pa'i dngos po zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar stobs de dag ni mngon par rtogs pa dang 'dres pa'i lam yin pas na de brtan pa'i dngos po zhes bya ste /
translated: Thus, these powers are the path mixed with clear realization, and therefore they are called the factor of stability.

original: de tsam gyis na ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan ma dang gnas ngan len chung ngu dang bral zhing nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog
analyzed: de tsam gyis na ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan ma dang gnas ngan len chung ngu dang bral zhing nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog
translated: At that point, one is free from the signs of complete concentration and from the subtle negative reflex actions, and one has attained the roots of virtue that are conducive to penetration, the patient acceptance that is in conformity with the truth, and the supreme mundane qualities.

original: thob ste / sbyor ba'i lam chen po yang @115b dag par brtsams pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: thob ste / sbyor ba'i lam chen po yang @115b dag par brtsams pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that one has begun the great path of application.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni /
translated: The seven factors of enlightenment🔽are taught by the verse:

original: 'phags pa'i dbang phyug bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i dbang phyug bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: The lord of the noble ones is the means of attraction.

original: des ni mngon par rtogs pa'i lam bstan to //
analyzed: des ni mngon par rtogs pa'i lam bstan to //
translated: This teaches the path of seeing.

original: de la 'phags pa'i dbang phyug ni mngon par rtogs pa dang / mthong ba'i lam mo ;
analyzed: de la 'phags pa'i dbang phyug ni mngon par rtogs pa dang / mthong ba'i lam mo ;
translated: The lord of the noble ones is the path of seeing and the path of direct seeing.

original: / de sdud pa'i dngos po ni mngon par rtogs pa'i lam ste /
analyzed: / de sdud pa'i dngos po ni mngon par rtogs pa'i lam ste /
translated: The means of attraction is the path of direct seeing,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun no //
translated: the seven factors of enlightenment.

original: de dag skyes pa'i dus na 'phags pa'i dbang phyug bsdus shing mthong ba'i lam thob par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag skyes pa'i dus na 'phags pa'i dbang phyug bsdus shing mthong ba'i lam thob par rig par bya'o //
translated: When they arise, one should know that the lord of noble ones is gathered and the path of seeing is attained.

original: de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na /
translated: What are the seven factors of awakening?

original: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
analyzed: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
translated: The factor of complete awakening that is right mindfulness, the factor of complete awakening that is the investigation of phenomena, the factor of complete awakening that is right effort, the factor of complete awakening that is right joy, the factor of complete awakening that is right pliancy,

original: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: the factor of complete awakening that is right concentration, and the factor of complete awakening that is right equanimity.

original: de la rim pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de la rim pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is their sequence?

original: de ltar bstan pa'i dngos po stobs lngas mngon par rtogs pa dang 'dres pa'i lam thob pa des ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan ma dang gnas ngan len chung ngu dang bral zhing nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bden pa
analyzed: de ltar bstan pa'i dngos po stobs lngas mngon par rtogs pa dang 'dres pa'i lam thob pa des ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan ma dang gnas ngan len chung ngu dang bral zhing nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bden pa
translated: One who obtains the path that is mixed with clear realization of the five powers that teach such topics obtains the signs of perfect concentration, is free of slight negative tendencies and obtains the roots of virtue that are conducive to penetrative insight,

original: dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog thob ste /
analyzed: dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog thob ste /
translated: the perseverance that is in conformity with the truth and the supreme mundane state.

original: sbyor ba'i lam chen po yang dag par brtsams pa na /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i lam chen po yang dag par brtsams pa na /
translated: When one begins the great path of preparation,

original: de'i gong du sbyor ba yang dag par brtsams pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs par byed par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i gong du sbyor ba yang dag par brtsams pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs par byed par rig par bya'o //
translated: one should know that one realizes the limit of reality through the branches of enlightenment that are the correct beginning of preparation.

original: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gi mjug thogs su sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa zag pa med pa skye ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gi mjug thogs su sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa zag pa med pa skye ste /
translated: Immediately after the supreme mundane state, uncontaminated perseverance for Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering arises.

original: de skyes na 'phags pa'i gang zag ces kyang bya /
analyzed: de skyes na 'phags pa'i gang zag ces kyang bya /
translated: When it arises, one is called an ārya being.

original: mthong ba'i lam thob pa zhes kyang bya'o ;
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam thob pa zhes kyang bya'o ;
translated: It is also called the path of seeing.

original: / de'i mjug thogs su sdug bsngal la chos shes pa dang / sdug bsngal rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal la rjes su rtogs par shes pa nas lam la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bar gyi skad cig bco lnga bo de dag skye ste /🔽de tsam gyis ni mthong ba'i lam @116a * //
analyzed: / de'i mjug thogs su sdug bsngal la chos shes pa dang / sdug bsngal rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal la rjes su rtogs par shes pa nas lam la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bar gyi skad cig bco lnga bo de dag skye ste / de tsam gyis ni mthong ba'i lam @116a * //
translated: Immediately after that, fifteen moments arise: the Dharma knowledge of the truth of suffering, the perseverance for subsequent knowledge of the truth of suffering, the subsequent knowledge of the truth of suffering, and so on up to the perseverance for subsequent knowledge of the truth of the path and the subsequent knowledge of the truth of the path.

original: yongs su rdzogs pa zhes kyang bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa zhes kyang bya'o //
translated: Just that is also called the complete path of seeing.

original: de dag kyang gang gis yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /
analyzed: de dag kyang gang gis yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /
translated: By what is it completed?

original: dper na me lce med pa'i me de byung ma thag kho nar me lce byung bar gyur te /
analyzed: dper na me lce med pa'i me de byung ma thag kho nar me lce byung bar gyur te /
translated: For example, when fire arises without a flame, immediately a flame arises.

original: me lce byung zhing 'bar ba des me'i bya ba byed pa de bzhin du ji ltar me lce byung bar gyur te me lce byung zhing 'bar ba des me'i bya ba byed pa de ltar ni gang zag 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gis yang dag par zin
analyzed: me lce byung zhing 'bar ba des me'i bya ba byed pa de bzhin du ji ltar me lce byung bar gyur te me lce byung zhing 'bar ba des me'i bya ba byed pa de ltar ni gang zag 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gis yang dag par zin
translated: The fire element arises and the blazing fire performs the function of fire.🔽Just as the fire element arises and the blazing fire performs the function of fire, so too, the person is fully grasped by the supreme mundane state.

original: pa'i dbang po lnga bo dag gi 'jug thogs kho nar byung ba 'jig rten las 'das pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: pa'i dbang po lnga bo dag gi 'jug thogs kho nar byung ba 'jig rten las 'das pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams blta bar bya'o //
translated: Just as the flame arises and performs the function of fire, so too, the supramundane, uncontaminated dharmas arise immediately after the five faculties that are conjoined with the supreme mundane state.

original: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag ste /
translated: They are the seven factors of awakening.

original: yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la zhugs pa'i gang zag gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa de ni byang chub ces bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la zhugs pa'i gang zag gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa de ni byang chub ces bya'o //
translated: The person who has entered the faultless state of reality realizes reality just as it is, and this is called awakening.

original: de'i yan lag tu gyur pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de'i yan lag tu gyur pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya ste /
translated: Those that are its limbs are called the factors of awakening.

original: de dag gis sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa zag pa med pa nas lam la rjes su rtogs par byed pa'i bzod pa'i bar gyi mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig bco lnga po dag yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de dag gis sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa zag pa med pa nas lam la rjes su rtogs par byed pa'i bzod pa'i bar gyi mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig bco lnga po dag yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the fifteen moments of the path of seeing, from the uncontaminated patience that is the understanding of the dharma with regard to suffering up to the patience that is the understanding of the subsequent knowledge with regard to the path.

original: de la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par gzhag pa'i bden pa la dmigs shing yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed pa'i tshul gyis yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par gzhag pa'i bden pa la dmigs shing yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed pa'i tshul gyis yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: In this regard, the sravakas and pratyekabuddhas complete the path by means of the direct realization of the limit of reality, focusing on the truths that are established.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni rnam par ma bzhag pa'i bde ba la dmigs shing yongs su 'dris pa'i shes pas yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni rnam par ma bzhag pa'i bde ba la dmigs shing yongs su 'dris pa'i shes pas yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: The bodhisattvas complete the path by means of the knowledge of thorough familiarization, focusing on the truth that is not established.

original: spyi'i tshul ni de lta'o //
analyzed: spyi'i tshul ni de lta'o //
translated: This is the general method.

original: de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yang dmigs pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang / grogs dang / bsgom pa dang / bsgoms pa'i 'bras bus rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yang dmigs pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang / grogs dang / bsgom pa dang / bsgoms pa'i 'bras bus rig par bya ste /
translated: The seven aids to enlightenment should be understood in terms of their focal object, their essential nature, their helpers, their cultivation, and the result of their cultivation.

original: de la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is their focal object?

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag gis yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag gis yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba'o //
translated: The four noble truths are the reality as it is.

original: ngo bo nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is their nature?

original: dran pa dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dga' ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms so //
analyzed: dran pa dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dga' ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms so //
translated: They are mindfulness, full awareness of the body, effort, joy, fitness, concentration, and equanimity.

original: de la dran pa ni yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la zhugs pa'i gang zag gis yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid bzhin du rtogs pa'i byang chub de'i gnas kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: de la dran pa ni yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la zhugs pa'i gang zag gis yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid bzhin du rtogs pa'i byang chub de'i gnas kyi yan lag go //
translated: Mindfulness is the factor of support for enlightenment, because the person who has entered the faultless state of reality has realized the reality as it is.

original: chos rnam par 'byed pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: chos rnam par 'byed pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi yan lag go //
translated: Full awareness of the body is the factor of nature.

original: brtson 'grus @116b ni nges par 'byung ba'i yan lag go //
analyzed: brtson 'grus @116b ni nges par 'byung ba'i yan lag go //
translated: Effort is the factor of release.

original: dga' ba bzhi ni phan yon gyi yan lag go //
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi ni phan yon gyi yan lag go //
translated: Joy is the factor of benefit.

original: shin tu sbyangs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms ni de'i kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i gzhi dang gnas dang ngo bo nyid kyi yan lag ste /
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms ni de'i kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i gzhi dang gnas dang ngo bo nyid kyi yan lag ste /
translated: Fitness, concentration, and equanimity are the factors of absence of defilement, the basis, the abode, and the nature.

original: gang gis kyang kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang du yang kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ste go rims bzhin no //
analyzed: gang gis kyang kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang du yang kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ste go rims bzhin no //
translated: It is the absence of defilement, the absence of the defiled, and the absence of defilement in regard to the object.

original: grogs gang zhe na /
analyzed: grogs gang zhe na /
translated: What is the companion?

original: de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so //
translated: It is the mind and mental activities associated with them.

original: bsgom pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: bsgom pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is cultivation?

original: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong ba yongs su bsngos pa bsgom pa dang / lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong ba yongs su bsngos pa bsgom pa dang / lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin no //
translated: It is the cultivation of the members of enlightenment, beginning with mindfulness, which is based on seclusion, dispassion, and cessation, and is directed to renunciation.

original: 'dis ni bden pa la dmigs pa byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom par yongs su bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni bden pa la dmigs pa byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom par yongs su bstan to //
translated: This shows the cultivation of the members of enlightenment which have the truths for their object.

original: bsgoms pa'i 'brus bu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i 'brus bu gang zhe na /
translated: What is the result of cultivation?

original: mthong bas spyang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa'o //
analyzed: mthong bas spyang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa'o //
translated: It is the abandonment of the defilements which should be abandoned by means of vision.

original: de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na /
translated: What is the factor of enlightenment of right mindfulness?

original: shes bya mi shes pa shes par bya ba'i phyir shes pa thams cad la dran pa dpyod pa ni dran pa'o //
analyzed: shes bya mi shes pa shes par bya ba'i phyir shes pa thams cad la dran pa dpyod pa ni dran pa'o //
translated: Mindfulness is the investigation of all the knowledges in order to know what is not known about the knowable.

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam gyis rab tu phye ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam gyis rab tu phye ba'o //
translated: Right is the analysis of the path of seeing, the path without obstacles and the path of liberation.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi yang dag pa nyid med pa la zhugs pa'i gang zag gi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub ces bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi yang dag pa nyid med pa la zhugs pa'i gang zag gi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub ces bya ste /
translated: The factor of enlightenment is the realization of the person who has entered into the reality of the path of seeing. That is called enlightenment.

original: de'i yan lag dang 'khor dang yo byad dang rgyu zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs so //
analyzed: de'i yan lag dang 'khor dang yo byad dang rgyu zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs so //
translated: Its branches, retinue, equipment, and cause are synonyms.

original: dben pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni chos shes pa'i bzod pa bzhi skyes nas bden pa bzhi mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa rnams kyis thob pa nas bzung ste /
analyzed: dben pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni chos shes pa'i bzod pa bzhi skyes nas bden pa bzhi mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa rnams kyis thob pa nas bzung ste /
translated: Abiding in seclusion refers to the four acceptances of the knowledge of phenomena, from the time of attaining the abandonment of the afflictions belonging to the desire realm that are to be abandoned by seeing the four truths.

original: 'gag pa ni dben pa zhes bya ste ;
analyzed: 'gag pa ni dben pa zhes bya ste ;
translated: Cessation is called seclusion.

original: de la byang chub kyi yan lag de gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de la byang chub kyi yan lag de gnas pa'o //
translated: The factors of enlightenment abide in that.🔽Abiding in freedom from attachment refers to the four knowledges of phenomena, from the time of attaining nirvana by those.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni chos shes pa bzhi yang de dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa nas bzung ste skye ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni chos shes pa bzhi yang de dag gis mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa nas bzung ste skye ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Arising is called freedom from attachment.

original: de la byang chub kyi yan lag gnas @117a * //
analyzed: de la byang chub kyi yan lag gnas @117a * //
translated: The factors of enlightenment abide in that.

original: pa'o ; /'gog pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa bzhi skyes nas bden pa bzhi mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa dang gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa rnams kyis thob pa nas bzung ste 'gag pa ni 'gag pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: pa'o ; /'gog pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa bzhi skyes nas bden pa bzhi mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa dang gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa rnams kyis thob pa nas bzung ste 'gag pa ni 'gag pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Abiding in cessation is the four subsequent cognitions of perseverance for subsequent cognition, because the afflictions to be abandoned by seeing the four truths and the obtainment belonging to the realms of form and the formless are arrested.

original: de la byang chub kyi yan lag de gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de la byang chub kyi yan lag de gnas pa'o //
translated: The branches of enlightenment abide there.

original: rnam par spong bar yongs su bsngos pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam par spong bar yongs su bsngos pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: The fourth is the complete dedication of abandonment.

original: de rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: Abandonment is nirvana.

original: der yongs su bsngos pa zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma bcu drug pa lam la rjes su rtogs par shes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam yin pas de ma gtogs pa mthong ba'i lam du gtogs pa rjes su rtogs par shes pa gsum po dag kyang de dag
analyzed: der yongs su bsngos pa zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma bcu drug pa lam la rjes su rtogs par shes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam yin pas de ma gtogs pa mthong ba'i lam du gtogs pa rjes su rtogs par shes pa gsum po dag kyang de dag
translated: Complete dedication is the three subsequent cognitions belonging to the path of seeing, excluding the sixteenth moment, because the path of seeing is the path of meditation.

original: gi mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa nas bzung ste skye ba ni da dung bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad ma lus par spang ba'i thob pa nas bzung ste skyes pa ma yin gyi de dang mthun pa'am der gzhol ba'am der yongs
analyzed: gi mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa nas bzung ste skye ba ni da dung bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad ma lus par spang ba'i thob pa nas bzung ste skyes pa ma yin gyi de dang mthun pa'am der gzhol ba'am der yongs
translated: From the attainment of nirvana until the attainment of the abandonment of all afflictions to be abandoned by the path of meditation, it is not that birth is not obtained, but it is merely compatible with that, or directed toward that, or fully dedicated to that.

original: su bsngos pa tsam du zad pas rnam par spong ba yongs su zad pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: su bsngos pa tsam du zad pas rnam par spong ba yongs su zad pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Therefore, it is called the complete abandonment of thorough relinquishment.

original: mthong ba'i lam gyis byang chub kyi yan lag de der yongs su bsngos pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam gyis byang chub kyi yan lag de der yongs su bsngos pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The limb of enlightenment of correct mindfulness is fully dedicated to that on the path of seeing.

original: chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na /
translated: What is the enlightenment factor of investigation of phenomena?

original: rtog pa dang mtshan ma thams cad 'joms shing de bzhin nyid rnam par 'byed pa ni chos rnam par 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa dang mtshan ma thams cad 'joms shing de bzhin nyid rnam par 'byed pa ni chos rnam par 'byed pa'o //
translated: The investigation of phenomena is the investigation of suchness that conquers all thoughts and signs.

original: yang dag dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dben pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi don ni snga ma bzhin te lhag ma thams cad la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dben pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi don ni snga ma bzhin te lhag ma thams cad la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the words “correct effort,” etc., is the same as before.

original: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yang lag gang zhe na /
analyzed: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yang lag gang zhe na /
translated: What is the factor of complete acceptance of effort?

original: myur du mngon par shes pa thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rab tu 'jug pa ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: myur du mngon par shes pa thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rab tu 'jug pa ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: It is the application of effort in order to attain the superknowledges quickly.

original: dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yang lag gang zhe na /
analyzed: dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yang lag gang zhe na /
translated: What is the factor of complete acceptance of joy?

original: brtson 'grus brtsams pas chos snang ba de'i dga' ba lus dang sems thams cad rtag tu dga' bar gyur pa ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtsams pas chos snang ba de'i dga' ba lus dang sems thams cad rtag tu dga' bar gyur pa ni dga' ba'o //
translated: It is the joy of the body and mind which comes from the light of the Dharma when one has begun to make effort.

original: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na /🔽gnas ngan len gyi sgrib pa thams cad rab tu bcom ste /
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na / gnas ngan len gyi sgrib pa thams cad rab tu bcom ste /
translated: What is the factor of complete acceptance of pliancy?

original: lus dang sems las su rung bar gyur na ni @117b sems rab tu sbyangs pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang sems las su rung bar gyur na ni @117b sems rab tu sbyangs pa'o //
translated: It is the pliancy of body and mind which comes from the destruction of all the obstacles of the bad habits.🔽What is the factor of complete acceptance of concentration?

original: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na /
translated: What is the limb of enlightenment of concentration?

original: bsam pa'i don thams cad 'grub pa'i rten du gyur ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: bsam pa'i don thams cad 'grub pa'i rten du gyur ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: It is one-pointedness of mind in calm and insight, which is the basis for the accomplishment of all the aims of thought.

original: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na /
analyzed: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na /
translated: What is the limb of enlightenment of equanimity?

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni btang snyoms zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni btang snyoms zhes bya ste /
translated: It is the knowledge of equanimity, which is the absence of all discrimination.

original: de dang de'i rjes la thob pa dag la 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyi thams cad du kun nas nyon mongs pa med par ci 'dod pa bzhin du gnas so //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po de dag ni zhi gnas kyi phyogs dang lhag mthong gi phyogs dang gnyi ga'i phyogs su gtogs pa yang yin te /
analyzed: de dang de'i rjes la thob pa dag la 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyi thams cad du kun nas nyon mongs pa med par ci 'dod pa bzhin du gnas so // byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po de dag ni zhi gnas kyi phyogs dang lhag mthong gi phyogs dang gnyi ga'i phyogs su gtogs pa yang yin te /
translated: It is the knowledge of the world, which is the absence of all defilement, and which is the state of being as one wishes in the acquisition of the other limbs.🔽These seven limbs of enlightenment are included in the categories of calm, insight, and both.

original: de la chos rnam par 'byed pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dga' ba gsum ni lhag mthong gi phyogs so //
analyzed: de la chos rnam par 'byed pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dga' ba gsum ni lhag mthong gi phyogs so //
translated: Among them, the three limbs of enlightenment of analysis of the teachings, of energy, and of delight are included in the category of insight.

original: shin tu sbyangs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms gsum ni zhi gnas kyi phyogs so //
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms gsum ni zhi gnas kyi phyogs so //
translated: The three of pliancy, concentration, and equanimity are on the side of calm abiding.

original: dran pa ni gnyis ga'i phyogs de kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dran pa ni gnyis ga'i phyogs de kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Mindfulness is on the side of both.

original: de ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po de dag ni mngon par rtogs pa'i lam yin pas na 'phags pa'i dbang phyug bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes bya ste /🔽de tsam gyis na sbyor ba yang dag par brtsams pa de'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po de dag ni mngon par rtogs pa'i lam yin pas na 'phags pa'i dbang phyug bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes bya ste / de tsam gyis na sbyor ba yang dag par brtsams pa de'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Thus, since these seven aids to enlightenment are the path of clear realization, they are called the “masteries of the āryas” and the “bases of gathering.”

original: de'i tshe na nyan thos ni slob pa bzhi mthong ba chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba chos mthong ba chos thob pa chos rig pa chos rtogs pa som nyi las brgal ba the tshom las brgal ba gzhan gyi dri nga
analyzed: de'i tshe na nyan thos ni slob pa bzhi mthong ba chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba chos mthong ba chos thob pa chos rig pa chos rtogs pa som nyi las brgal ba the tshom las brgal ba gzhan gyi dri nga
translated: At that point, the śrāvaka who is a trainee, who has seen the four truths, has the eye of Dharma with respect to phenomena, is free of dust, free of contaminants, has seen phenomena, has attained phenomena, has known phenomena, has fathomed phenomena, has crossed over uncertainty, has crossed over doubt, and is without any other teacher.

original: mi 'jog pa ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyis mi bkri ba chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob pa rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: mi 'jog pa ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyis mi bkri ba chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob pa rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no //
translated: He is established in the fruit of stream-entry, having attained the fearlessness of a Stream-enterer, which is the unshakability of his faith in the Buddha, Dhamma and Sangha and in the practice of virtues dear to the Noble Ones.

original: skad cig ma bcu drug thob pa nas ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma bcu drug thob pa nas ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa yin no //
translated: He is established in the fruit of stream-entry, having attained the unshakability of his faith in the Buddha, Dhamma and Sangha and in the practice of virtues dear to the Noble Ones.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pas sa dang po thob pa dang sa de'i phan yon yang nyams su myong ba yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pas sa dang po thob pa dang sa de'i phan yon yang nyams su myong ba yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The Bodhisattva, on the other hand, is established in the first stage of the Bodhisattva, having been born into the family of the Tathagatas, and he experiences the benefits of that stage.🔽The Noble Eightfold Path

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni /
translated: The Noble Eightfold Path is shown by the words:🔽“The Noble Ones’ side, the gathering of a following,

original: 'phags pa'i phyogs dang 'khor bsdu ba'i dngos po @118a * //🔽zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i phyogs dang 'khor bsdu ba'i dngos po @118a * // zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: and the means of conversion.”

original: des ni rnam par dag pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam bstan to //
analyzed: des ni rnam par dag pa nges par 'byin pa'i lam bstan to //
translated: This shows the path of purification that leads to deliverance.

original: de la 'phags pa'i phyogs dang 'khor dang rnam par dag pa ste bsgom pa'i lam mo //
analyzed: de la 'phags pa'i phyogs dang 'khor dang rnam par dag pa ste bsgom pa'i lam mo //
translated: Herein, the Noble Ones’ side is the path of practice.

original: de sdud pa'i dngos po ni rnam par dag par nges par 'byin pa'i lam ste /
analyzed: de sdud pa'i dngos po ni rnam par dag par nges par 'byin pa'i lam ste /
translated: The means of gathering them is the path of definite deliverance that is pure.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
translated: It is the eightfold noble path.

original: de skyes pa'i dus na 'phags pa'i phyogs dang 'khor bsdus shing bsgom pa'i lam thob par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de skyes pa'i dus na 'phags pa'i phyogs dang 'khor bsdus shing bsgom pa'i lam thob par rig par bya'o //
translated: When it arises, one should understand that the side of the noble ones is gathered, and that the path of cultivation is attained.

original: de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the eightfold noble path?

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
translated: It is right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness,

original: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: and right concentration.

original: de la rim pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de la rim pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is their sequence?

original: de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams thob pa'i phyir de'i tshe na slob pa bzhi mthong ba'am byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po yin te /
analyzed: de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams thob pa'i phyir de'i tshe na slob pa bzhi mthong ba'am byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po yin te /
translated: When one attains the factors of enlightenment, at that time one sees the four trainings or the first bodhisattva stage.

original: de'i mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni spangs zin gyi /
analyzed: de'i mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni spangs zin gyi /
translated: The afflictions that are to be abandoned by the path of vision have already been abandoned.🔽The afflictions that are to be abandoned by the path of cultivation remain.

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams lus pa na de dag spang ba'i phyir phung po gsum pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom par byed de /
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams lus pa na de dag spang ba'i phyir phung po gsum pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom par byed de /
translated: In order to abandon them, one cultivates the third aggregate, the eightfold noble path.

original: des sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par thar bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du rjes su thob par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: des sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par thar bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du rjes su thob par rig par bya'o //
translated: By that, one becomes liberated from all obscurations and attains the unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dmigs pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang / grogs dang / bsgom pa dang / bsgoms pa'i 'bras bus rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dmigs pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang / grogs dang / bsgom pa dang / bsgoms pa'i 'bras bus rig par bya ste /
translated: The eightfold noble path should be understood in terms of its object, its nature, its support, its cultivation, and its result of cultivation.

original: de la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is its object?

original: de'i 'og tu 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba'o //
translated: It is the reality of the four noble truths just as it is.

original: ngo bo nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is its nature?

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste /
translated: It is the eightfold noble path.

original: de la yang dag pa'i lta ba ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi tshe mthong ba'i lam la yongs su gcod pa'i yan lag ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rjes la thob pa'i 'jig rten pa des rang gi rtog pa de yongs su gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang dag pa'i lta ba ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi tshe mthong ba'i lam la yongs su gcod pa'i yan lag ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rjes la thob pa'i 'jig rten pa des rang gi rtog pa de yongs su gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Right view is the branch of complete discernment at the time of the path of meditation, because that mundane subsequent knowledge of the transcendent path completely discerns one's realization.

original: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i ngag gi gzhan go bar @118b byed pa'i yan lag ste kun nas slong ba dang bcas pa'i ngag gis de go bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i ngag gi gzhan go bar @118b byed pa'i yan lag ste kun nas slong ba dang bcas pa'i ngag gis de go bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Right thought and right speech are the branch of causing others to understand, because one causes others to understand through speech that is motivated by right thought.

original: yang dag pa'i ngag dang yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gsum ni gzhan yid ches par byed pa'i yan lag ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ngag dang yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gsum ni gzhan yid ches par byed pa'i yan lag ste /
translated: The three right speech, right action and right livelihood are the branch of causing others to have faith.

original: yang dag pa'i ngag gis rnyed pa dang 'phel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pas shes rab la yid ches par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ngag gis rnyed pa dang 'phel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pas shes rab la yid ches par 'gyur ro //
translated: Right speech causes others to have faith in wisdom through the ascertainment of speech that is concerned with gain and increase.

original: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' bya ba ma yin pa mi byed par tshul khrims la yid ches par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' bya ba ma yin pa mi byed par tshul khrims la yid ches par 'gyur ro //
translated: One has confidence in morality because one does not do what should not be done through right action.

original: yang dag pa'i 'tsho bas chos gos la sogs pa tshod zin par tshol bas yo byad bsnyungs pa la yid ches par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i 'tsho bas chos gos la sogs pa tshod zin par tshol bas yo byad bsnyungs pa la yid ches par 'gyur ro //
translated: One has confidence in the reduction of possessions because one seeks robes, etc. in moderation through right livelihood.

original: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi gnyen po'am yan lag ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi gnyen po'am yan lag ste /
translated: Right effort, right mindfulness, and right concentration are the branches that are the antidotes to the discordances.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: The discordances are threefold:🔽the afflictions that are to be abandoned by the path of cultivation,

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba nyon mongs pa dang / nyal ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / rgod pa'i dbang gis mi mthun pa'i phyogs yon tan khyad par can mngon par 'grub pa'i gegs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba nyon mongs pa dang / nyal ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / rgod pa'i dbang gis mi mthun pa'i phyogs yon tan khyad par can mngon par 'grub pa'i gegs su gyur pa'o //
translated: the afflictions of sleep, and the discordances that are the obstacles to the realization of special qualities through the power of agitation.

original: de la dang po'i gnyen po ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ste des lam bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la dang po'i gnyen po ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ste des lam bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The antidote to the first is right effort, because one cultivates the path through that.

original: gnyis pa'i gnyen po ni yang dag pa'i dran pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis pa'i gnyen po ni yang dag pa'i dran pa ste /
translated: The antidote to the second is right mindfulness,

original: zhi gnas la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gnas pas bying ba dang rgod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi gnas la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gnas pas bying ba dang rgod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one is free from laxity and excitedness by the close placement of mindfulness on the reasons for serenity, etc.

original: gsum pa'i gnyen po ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: gsum pa'i gnyen po ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: The antidote to the third is right concentration,

original: bsam gtan la gnas nas mngon par shes pa la sogs pa yon tan mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan la gnas nas mngon par shes pa la sogs pa yon tan mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one accomplishes the qualities such as the superknowledges by abiding in the meditative concentrations.

original: grogs gang zhe na /
analyzed: grogs gang zhe na /
translated: What is the companion?

original: de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so //
translated: It is the mind and mental activities associated with them.

original: bsgom pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: bsgom pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is cultivation?

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bzhi'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bzhi'o //

original: bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu gang zhe na /

original: yongs su gcod pa dang gzhan go bar byed pa dang gzhan yid ches par byed pa dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa dang yon tan khyad par can la sgrib pa rnam par dag
analyzed: yongs su gcod pa dang gzhan go bar byed pa dang gzhan yid ches par byed pa dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa dang yon tan khyad par can la sgrib pa rnam par dag
translated: It is the cultivation of the path of the four correct abandonments and the abandonment of the path of the four errors.🔽It is the cultivation of the path of the four foundations of mindfulness and the abandonment of the path of the four errors.🔽It is the cultivation of the path of the five faculties and the abandonment of the path of the five obscurations.🔽It is the cultivation of the path of the five powers and the abandonment of the path of the five aggregates.
