original: gang dag nyon mongs pa med pa de dag ni skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes rnam par phye bas lan gdab pa lta bu la sogs pa'o //🔽dris te lan gdab pa rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni mi rnams khyad par du 'phags pa yin nam /
analyzed: gang dag nyon mongs pa med pa de dag ni skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes rnam par phye bas lan gdab pa lta bu la sogs pa'o // dris te lan gdab pa rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni mi rnams khyad par du 'phags pa yin nam /
translated: Those who are without defilements do not take rebirth.🔽The answer is to be determined by asking a question: Are humans superior or inferior?🔽If the questioner replies that he is asking in relation to the lower realms, then the answer is that humans are superior.

original: dman pa yin zhes dris pa las gang la ltos te 'dri zhes phyir dris nas gal te ngan song rnams la ltos nas 'dri'o zhes zer na ni khyad par du 'phags pa yin no zhes lan gdab pa dang / gal te lha rnams la ltos te 'dri'o zhes zer na ni dman pa yin no zhes lan gdab pa lta bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dman pa yin zhes dris pa las gang la ltos te 'dri zhes phyir dris nas gal te ngan song rnams la ltos nas 'dri'o zhes zer na ni khyad par du 'phags pa yin no zhes lan gdab pa dang / gal te lha rnams la ltos te 'dri'o zhes zer na ni dman pa yin no zhes lan gdab pa lta bu la sogs pa'o //
translated: If he replies that he is asking in relation to the gods, then the answer is that humans are inferior.

original: gzhag pa las lan gdab pa rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni bdag phung po rnams dang gcig gam tha dad ces 'dri ba la bdag gtan med pa phung po rnams dang gcig gam tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur ba yod re skan snyam du don gyi
analyzed: gzhag pa las lan gdab pa rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni bdag phung po rnams dang gcig gam tha dad ces 'dri ba la bdag gtan med pa phung po rnams dang gcig gam tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur ba yod re skan snyam du don gyi
translated: The arrangement of a reply by way of setting aside is as follows: When asked, Is the self the same as or different from the aggregates? one thinks, It is impossible for the self, which does not exist at all, to be the same as or different from the aggregates.

original: dbang de yid la byas te cang mi smra bas lan gdab pa lta bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dbang de yid la byas te cang mi smra bas lan gdab pa lta bu la sogs pa'o //
translated: One replies by remaining silent, thinking of the meaning of that.

original: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni sems can snod du ma gyur ba dag la don zab mo gsang ba'o //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni sems can snod du ma gyur ba dag la don zab mo gsang ba'o //
translated: The secret is the profound meaning that is secret from those who are not vessels.

original: rnam par dbye ba lan gdab pa rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni snod du gyur dag la sgrogs par mdzad do //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba lan gdab pa rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni snod du gyur dag la sgrogs par mdzad do //
translated: The arrangement of a reply by way of analysis is to proclaim it to those who are vessels.

original: skyon rnams ni ngas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams kyi nyes dmigs rnam grangs du mar bstan pa gang yin pa dag go zhes bya ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang @130b las dang kun nas skye ba'i
analyzed: skyon rnams ni ngas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams kyi nyes dmigs rnam grangs du mar bstan pa gang yin pa dag go zhes bya ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang @130b las dang kun nas skye ba'i
translated: The faults are the many different kinds of disadvantages of the phenomena of affliction.

original: nyon mongs pas bsdus pa'i chos rnams so //
analyzed: nyon mongs pas bsdus pa'i chos rnams so //
translated: The phenomena of affliction are the phenomena that are included in affliction, karma, and the origin of affliction.

original: de dag gi nyes dmigs rnam grangs du mar bstan pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de dag gi nyes dmigs rnam grangs du mar bstan pa gang zhe na /
translated: What are the many different kinds of disadvantages of those?

original: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes dmigs ni rnam pa du ma 'di lta ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes dmigs ni rnam pa du ma 'di lta ste /
translated: The disadvantages of the affliction of affliction are of many kinds.

original: sems kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa dang / dmigs pa la phyin ci log tu byed pa dang / bag la nyal brtan par byed pa dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'du byed kyi rgyud 'jug par byed pa dang / bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka la gnod pa dang /
analyzed: sems kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa dang / dmigs pa la phyin ci log tu byed pa dang / bag la nyal brtan par byed pa dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'du byed kyi rgyud 'jug par byed pa dang / bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka la gnod pa dang /
translated: They are: afflicting the mind, distorting the object, stabilizing latent propensities, causing the continuity of karma to continue, and harming oneself, others, and both.

original: tshe 'di dang phyi ma gnyis ka'i kha na ma tho ba bskyed pa dang / de las skyes pa'i sems de las byung ba'i sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba nyams su myong bar byed pa dang / skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal 'grub par byed pad dang /
analyzed: tshe 'di dang phyi ma gnyis ka'i kha na ma tho ba bskyed pa dang / de las skyes pa'i sems de las byung ba'i sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba nyams su myong bar byed pa dang / skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal 'grub par byed pad dang /
translated: It generates the misdeeds of this and the next life, it produces the suffering and mental dissatisfaction that arises from that, it produces the suffering of birth and so on,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa las rgyud thag ring bar byed pa dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su nyams par byed pa dang / longs spyod nyams par byed pa dang / 'khor gyi nang du zhum par 'gyur ba dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su sdig pa mi snyam pa'i sgra grags par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa las rgyud thag ring bar byed pa dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su nyams par byed pa dang / longs spyod nyams par byed pa dang / 'khor gyi nang du zhum par 'gyur ba dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su sdig pa mi snyam pa'i sgra grags par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: it distances one from the continuum of nirvana, it causes the degeneration of virtuous dharmas, it causes the degeneration of resources, it causes timidity in the midst of an assembly, it causes the sound of nonvirtue to resound in all directions,

original: dam pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur ba dang / 'gyod bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang / lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltong ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba dang / bdag gi don thob par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dam pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur ba dang / 'gyod bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang / lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltong ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba dang / bdag gi don thob par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: to be despised by the holy ones; to die with regret; to be reborn in the hells, the bad destinies, the unfortunate planes of existence, after the dissolution and end of the body; and to fail to attain one’s own goal.

original: las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes dmigs ni rnam pa bdun te /🔽bdag la gnod pa dang / gzhan la gnod pa dang / gnyis ka la gnod pa dang / tshe 'di'i kha na ma tho ba bskyed pa dang / tshe phyi ma'i kha na ma tho ba bskyed pa dang ; tshe 'di dang phyi ma'i kha na ma tho ba bskyed pa dang /
analyzed: las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes dmigs ni rnam pa bdun te / bdag la gnod pa dang / gzhan la gnod pa dang / gnyis ka la gnod pa dang / tshe 'di'i kha na ma tho ba bskyed pa dang / tshe phyi ma'i kha na ma tho ba bskyed pa dang ; tshe 'di dang phyi ma'i kha na ma tho ba bskyed pa dang /
translated: The faults of the afflictions of action are also sevenfold:

original: de las skyes pa'i sems las byung ba'i sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba de nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de las skyes pa'i sems las byung ba'i sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba de nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: harm to oneself, harm to others, harm to both, producing evil in this life, producing evil in future lives, producing evil in both this life and the next, and the suffering and mental unhappiness born from that.

original: skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes dmigs ni skye ba'i rab tu dbye ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang ma nges pa dang 'jug pa dag las ci rigs par rig par ba'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nyes dmigs ni skye ba'i rab tu dbye ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang ma nges pa dang 'jug pa dag las ci rigs par rig par ba'o //
translated: The disadvantage of the defilement of birth is to be known as the classification of birth, suffering, uncertainty, and engagement, as appropriate.

original: yon tan rnams ni ngas rnam spar byang ba'i chos rnams kyi phan yon rnam grangs du mar bstan pa gang yin pa dag go zhes bya ba la rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam dang rnam par dag pa'i🔽lam rnams so// @131a * //
analyzed: yon tan rnams ni ngas rnam spar byang ba'i chos rnams kyi phan yon rnam grangs du mar bstan pa gang yin pa dag go zhes bya ba la rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam dang rnam par dag pa'i lam rnams so// @131a * //
translated: The qualities are the benefits of the factors of purification that have been taught by me in many ways. The factors of purification are the path of accumulation, the path of preparation, and the path of purity.

original: de dag gi phan yon rnam grangs du ma bstan pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spong ba dang gnyen po bskyed pa'i rim gyis mthar thug pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i bar du ji skad bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag gi phan yon rnam grangs du ma bstan pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spong ba dang gnyen po bskyed pa'i rim gyis mthar thug pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i bar du ji skad bstan pa yin no //
translated: The benefits of those have been taught in many ways, as has been explained, through the process of abandoning the counteragents and producing the antidotes, up to the attainment of the ultimate result.

original: tshul ni rnam pa drug tu rig par bya ste /
analyzed: tshul ni rnam pa drug tu rig par bya ste /
translated: The method should be known as sixfold.

original: de kho na'i don gyi tshul dang / thob pa'i tshul dang ; bshad pa'i tshul dang / mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul dang / dgongs pa'i tshul lo zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi bka' shes bya'i gnas thams cad ni mdor bsdu na tshul drug po de dag khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na'i don gyi tshul dang / thob pa'i tshul dang ; bshad pa'i tshul dang / mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul dang / dgongs pa'i tshul lo zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi bka' shes bya'i gnas thams cad ni mdor bsdu na tshul drug po de dag khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: The six modes are the mode of reality, the mode of attainment, the mode of explanation, the mode of avoiding the two extremes, the mode of the inconceivable, and the mode of intention.

original: de la tshul snga ma gsum ni tshul phyi ma gsum gyis khong du chud par bya ste /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la tshul snga ma gsum ni tshul phyi ma gsum gyis khong du chud par bya ste / 'di lta ste /
translated: The first three modes are to be understood by means of the latter three modes.

original: de kho na'i tshul gyis mtha' gnyis rnam par spang ba'i tshul gyis khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na'i tshul gyis mtha' gnyis rnam par spang ba'i tshul gyis khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: The mode of reality is to be understood by means of the mode of avoiding the two extremes.

original: thob pa'i tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul gyis khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: thob pa'i tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul gyis khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: The mode of attainment is to be understood by means of the mode of the inconceivable.

original: bshad pa'i tshul ni dgongs pa'i tshul gyis khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: bshad pa'i tshul ni dgongs pa'i tshul gyis khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: The mode of explanation is to be understood by means of the mode of intention.

original: de la de kho na'i don 'di tshul yin pas de kho na'i don gyi tshul te /
analyzed: de la de kho na'i don 'di tshul yin pas de kho na'i don gyi tshul te /
translated: The mode of that is the mode of reality.

original: dgongs pa nyid tshul yin pas dgongs pa'i tshul gyi bar du'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: dgongs pa nyid tshul yin pas dgongs pa'i tshul gyi bar du'ang de bzhin no //
translated: Up to the mode of the intention is the mode of the intention.

original: tshul gyi don ni de dang de la ma nor ba nyid dang ji lta ba de bzhin nyid dang phyin ci ma log pa yin pa'o //
analyzed: tshul gyi don ni de dang de la ma nor ba nyid dang ji lta ba de bzhin nyid dang phyin ci ma log pa yin pa'o //
translated: The meaning of mode is non-erroneous with regard to this and that, just as it is, and unmistaken.

original: de la de kho na'i don ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug tu rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de la de kho na'i don ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug tu rig par bya ste /
translated: Here, the meaning of reality should be known in brief as sixfold:

original: 'jig rten pa'i grags pa'i de kho na dang / rigs pas grags pa'i de kho na dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul gyi de kho na dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul gyi de kho na dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i grags pa'i de kho na dang / rigs pas grags pa'i de kho na dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul gyi de kho na dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul gyi de kho na dang /
translated: The reality of worldly renown, the reality of logical renown, the reality that is the domain of the consciousness purified of afflictive obstructions, the reality that is the domain of the consciousness purified of obstructions to knowledge,

original: rnam par bzhag pa'i de kho na dang / rnam par ma bzhag pa'i de kho na'o //
analyzed: rnam par bzhag pa'i de kho na dang / rnam par ma bzhag pa'i de kho na'o //
translated: the reality of positing, and the reality of non-positing.

original: de la 'jig rten gyi grags pa'i de kho na gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten gyi grags pa'i de kho na gang zhe na /
translated: Here, what is the reality of worldly renown?

original: brda dang kun rdzob la 'dris pa'i rjes su 'gro bas zhugs pa'i blos dngos po gang la 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi lta ba mtshungs pa 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi nges pa'i spyod yul gcig nas gcig tu 'ongs pa'i ming gis rang gi rnam par rtog
analyzed: brda dang kun rdzob la 'dris pa'i rjes su 'gro bas zhugs pa'i blos dngos po gang la 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi lta ba mtshungs pa 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi nges pa'i spyod yul gcig nas gcig tu 'ongs pa'i ming gis rang gi rnam par rtog
translated: grasps things that are renowned in one’s own thoughts, without analysis,

original: pa la grags pa ma bsams ma dpyad ma brtags par bzung ba'i dngos po gzugs zhe'am /
analyzed: pa la grags pa ma bsams ma dpyad ma brtags par bzung ba'i dngos po gzugs zhe'am /
translated: without examination, without investigation, and without consideration.🔽Those things that are called “form,” “sound,” and so on are called “the

original: sgra zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten gyi grags pa'i de kho na zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sgra zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten gyi grags pa'i de kho na zhes bya'o //
translated: suchness that is renowned in the world.”

original: rigs @131b pas grags pa'i de kho na gang zhe na /
analyzed: rigs @131b pas grags pa'i de kho na gang zhe na /
translated: What is the suchness that is renowned through reasoning?🔽The suchness that is renowned through reasoning is the suchness that is🔽known to those who are skilled in the meaning of the holy treatises, who are🔽wise, who are endowed with the analysis of reasoning, who are engaged in🔽the stage of understanding reasoning, who are ordinary beings, who are🔽engaged in the analysis of their own confidence, and whose knowledge is

original: dam par rigs pa'i don la mkhas pa mdzangs pa rtog ge'i dpyod pa dang ldan pa rtog ger rtogs pa'i sa rang gi spobs pa las byung ba so so skye bo ba dpyod pa'i rjes su spyod pa rnams kyi shes pa shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam
analyzed: dam par rigs pa'i don la mkhas pa mdzangs pa rtog ge'i dpyod pa dang ldan pa rtog ger rtogs pa'i sa rang gi spobs pa las byung ba so so skye bo ba dpyod pa'i rjes su spyod pa rnams kyi shes pa shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam
translated: very clear.

original: par nges pa'i spyod yul shes bya'i dngos po mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang yid ches pa'i lung gi tshad ma la brten nas 'thad pa bsgrubs pa'i rigs pas rab tu bsgrub cing rnam par gzhag pa rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni🔽rigs pas grags pa'i de kho na zhes bya'o //
analyzed: par nges pa'i spyod yul shes bya'i dngos po mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang yid ches pa'i lung gi tshad ma la brten nas 'thad pa bsgrubs pa'i rigs pas rab tu bsgrub cing rnam par gzhag pa rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni rigs pas grags pa'i de kho na zhes bya'o //
translated: The object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of cessation is the object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of the path.🔽The object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of the path is the object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of suffering.

original: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul gyi de kho na gang zhe na /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul gyi de kho na gang zhe na /
translated: The object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of suffering is the object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of origination.🔽The object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of origination is the object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of cessation.🔽The object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of cessation is the object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of the path.🔽The object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of the path is the object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of suffering.🔽The object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of suffering is the object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of origination.🔽The object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of origination is the object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of cessation.🔽The object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of cessation is the object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of the path.🔽The object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of the path is the object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of suffering.🔽The object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of suffering is the object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of origination.🔽The object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of origination is the object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of cessation.🔽The object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of cessation is the object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of the path.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa med pa dang zag pa med pa thob par byed pa dang / zag pa med pa'i rjes la thob pa 'jig rten pa'i shes pas spyod yul du bya ba 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi gang yin pa de ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul gyi de kho na zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa med pa dang zag pa med pa thob par byed pa dang / zag pa med pa'i rjes la thob pa 'jig rten pa'i shes pas spyod yul du bya ba 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi gang yin pa de ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul gyi de kho na zhes bya'o //
translated: The object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of the path is the object of activity of the knowledge of the truth of suffering.🔽The object of activity of the knowledge of

original: shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul gyi de kho na gang zhe na /🔽chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid las brtsams te byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes chos bdag med pa la 'jug pa dang zhugs par 'gyur ba shin tu rnam par dag pa tshig tu btags pa'i ngo
analyzed: shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul gyi de kho na gang zhe na / chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid las brtsams te byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes chos bdag med pa la 'jug pa dang zhugs par 'gyur ba shin tu rnam par dag pa tshig tu btags pa'i ngo
translated: What is the reality that is the domain of the consciousness that is purified of the obscurations to omniscience?

original: bo nyid rnam par mi rtog pa dang mtshungs par spyod yul gyi yul du bya ba de bzhin nyid mchog bla na med pa shes bya'i mthar thug pa gang yin pa de ni shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes bya'i spyod yul gyi de kho na
analyzed: bo nyid rnam par mi rtog pa dang mtshungs par spyod yul gyi yul du bya ba de bzhin nyid mchog bla na med pa shes bya'i mthar thug pa gang yin pa de ni shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes bya'i spyod yul gyi de kho na
translated: It is the supreme, unsurpassed suchness that is the ultimate object of knowledge, which is the object of the domain of the consciousness that is purified of the obscurations to omniscience.🔽It is the object of the domain of the consciousness that is purified of the obscurations to omniscience.

original: zhes bya'o // rnam par gzhag pa'i de kho na gang zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // rnam par gzhag pa'i de kho na gang zhe na /
translated: What is the reality of classification?

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ste sdug bsngal ni sdug bsngal du rnam par gzhag pa dang / lam gyi bar du lam du rnam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ste sdug bsngal ni sdug bsngal du rnam par gzhag pa dang / lam gyi bar du lam du rnam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: The four noble truths are established as they are taught: suffering is established as suffering, up to the path is established as the path.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar de ni kun rdzob rnam pa gsum gyis rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni kun rdzob rnam pa gsum gyis rnam par 'jog par byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because they are established by the three kinds of conventional truth:

original: 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob dang / rigs pa'i kun rdzob dang / rtogs pa'i kun rdzob kyis so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob dang / rigs pa'i kun rdzob dang / rtogs pa'i kun rdzob kyis so //
translated: the conventional truth of the world, the conventional truth of reasoning, and the conventional truth of realization.

original: de la 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob ni /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob ni /
translated: The conventional truth of the world

original: khang khyim dang bum pa dang dmag dang nags tshal dang grangs la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa dang / bdag dang sems can la sogs @132a * //
analyzed: khang khyim dang bum pa dang dmag dang nags tshal dang grangs la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa dang / bdag dang sems can la sogs @132a * //
translated: is established by such conventions as house, pot, army, forest, and number, and by such conventions as self, sentient being, and so on.

original: pa rnam par gzhag pas rnam par 'jog go //
analyzed: pa rnam par gzhag pas rnam par 'jog go //
translated: The conventional truth of reasoning

original: rigs pa'i kun rdzob kyis ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pas rnam par 'jog go //
analyzed: rigs pa'i kun rdzob kyis ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pas rnam par 'jog go //
translated: is established by such conventions as the aggregates, constituents, and sense spheres.

original: rtogs pa'i kun rdzob kyis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa dang de dag gi gnas rnam par gzhag pas rnam par 'jog go //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i kun rdzob kyis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa dang de dag gi gnas rnam par gzhag pas rnam par 'jog go //
translated: The conventional of realization is the result of stream-entry and so forth, and their states are established by the conventional of realization.

original: de dag kyang mdor bsdu na rnam par gzhag pa rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag kyang mdor bsdu na rnam par gzhag pa rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te /
translated: Those are also, in brief, fourfold:

original: ji skad bstan pa rnam pa gsum dang don dam pa'i kun rdzob kyis don dam pa'i bden pa rnam par gzhag pa ste /🔽don dam pa de'i don ni so sor rang rig pa yin pa'i phyir don dam pa de shes pa skye ba dang mthun pa nyid la brten te /
analyzed: ji skad bstan pa rnam pa gsum dang don dam pa'i kun rdzob kyis don dam pa'i bden pa rnam par gzhag pa ste / don dam pa de'i don ni so sor rang rig pa yin pa'i phyir don dam pa de shes pa skye ba dang mthun pa nyid la brten te /
translated: the three as they have been taught and the ultimate conventional.🔽The ultimate truth is established by the ultimate conventional because the meaning of the ultimate is individually cognized.

original: kun rdzob kyi tha snyad du don dam pa'i bden pa zhes rnam par 'jog go //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi tha snyad du don dam pa'i bden pa zhes rnam par 'jog go //
translated: Therefore, the ultimate is established in dependence on the arising of the knowledge of that ultimate, and it is designated as the ultimate truth by the conventional of the relative.

original: rnam par ma bzhag pa'i de kho na gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par ma bzhag pa'i de kho na gang zhe na /
translated: What is reality that is not established?

original: chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi yul 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi dmigs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi yul 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi dmigs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the reality of things, the perfected nature, the domain of the wisdom of the noble ones, the object of the wisdom of the noble ones, the focus of the wisdom of the noble ones.

original: 'thob pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'thob pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is attainment?

original: 'thob pa ni mdor na rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: 'thob pa ni mdor na rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: In brief, attainment is fourfold:

original: sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'thob pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'thob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'thob pa dang / theg pa chen po 'thob pa'o ;
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'thob pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'thob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'thob pa dang / theg pa chen po 'thob pa'o ;
translated: attainment of the evolutionary actions of sentient beings, attainment of the disciple’s vehicle, attainment of the solitary-buddha vehicle, and attainment of the universal vehicle.

original: / de la sems can rnams kyi rnam par smin pa 'thob pa ni las dge ba dang mi dge ba mngon par 'du byed pas las bdag gir bya ba nyid la brten nas rgyu des 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar sems can rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mngon
analyzed: / de la sems can rnams kyi rnam par smin pa 'thob pa ni las dge ba dang mi dge ba mngon par 'du byed pas las bdag gir bya ba nyid la brten nas rgyu des 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar sems can rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mngon
translated: Attainment of the evolutionary actions of sentient beings is the actualization of the evolutionary actions of sentient beings in the five destinies of cyclic life, and the experience of the results of those actions, based on the fact that sentient beings are the owners of their actions, through the performance of virtuous and nonvirtuous actions.

original: par 'grub pa dang rnam par smin pa so sor myong ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: par 'grub pa dang rnam par smin pa so sor myong ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: Attainment of the disciple’s vehicle is the attainment of the disciple’s enlightenment, based on the practice of the disciple’s path.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa 'thob pa ni skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa nas dge sbyong gi rgyan gyi bar du tshogs kyi lam la brten nas rnam pa lnga 'thob pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa 'thob pa ni skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa nas dge sbyong gi rgyan gyi bar du tshogs kyi lam la brten nas rnam pa lnga 'thob pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: The attainment of the sravaka vehicle is the attainment of five aspects based on the path of accumulation, from going for refuge up to the ornaments of a monk.

original: sa thob pa dang / shes pa thob pa dang / dad pa thob pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa dang / yon tan thob pa'o //
analyzed: sa thob pa dang / shes pa thob pa dang / dad pa thob pa dang / 'bras bu thob pa dang / yon tan thob pa'o //
translated: Attainment of the level, attainment of knowledge, attainment of faith, attainment of result and attainment of qualities.

original: de las thob pa ni sa gsum ste /
analyzed: de las thob pa ni sa gsum ste /
translated: Attainment of the level is the three levels

original: mthong ba'i sa dang / bsgom pa'i sa dang / mthar thug pa'i sa'o //
analyzed: mthong ba'i sa dang / bsgom pa'i sa dang / mthar thug pa'i sa'o //
translated: the level of seeing, the level of meditation and the level of culmination.

original: shes pa thob pa ni dgu ste /
analyzed: shes pa thob pa ni dgu ste /
translated: Attainment of knowledge is the nine knowledges

original: chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / de dag gi @132b rjes las thob pa kun rdzob shes pa dang /
analyzed: chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / de dag gi @132b rjes las thob pa kun rdzob shes pa dang /
translated: knowledge of phenomena, subsequent knowledge, knowledge of suffering, knowledge of origin, knowledge of cessation, knowledge of the path, conventional knowledge obtained from those,

original: zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa'o //
analyzed: zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa'o //
translated: knowledge of elimination and knowledge of nonarising.

original: dad pa thob pa ni shes nas dad pa bzhi po dag ste /
analyzed: dad pa thob pa ni shes nas dad pa bzhi po dag ste /
translated: Attainment of faith is the four types of faith through knowledge.

original: dkon mchog gsum dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims so //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims so //
translated: the Three Jewels, and morality pleasing to the noble ones.

original: 'bras bu thob pa ni dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po dag ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu thob pa ni dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po dag ste /
translated: The attainment of the fruit is the four fruits of the sramana,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar ro //🔽yon tan thob pa ni tshad med pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang / zad par gyi skye mched dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang smon nas shes pa dang so sor yang dag par rig pa dang /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar ro // yon tan thob pa ni tshad med pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang / zad par gyi skye mched dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang smon nas shes pa dang so sor yang dag par rig pa dang /
translated: from the fruit of the stream-enterer up to the fruit of the perfected being.

original: mngon par shes pa thob pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa thob pa'o //
translated: The attainment of qualities is the attainment of the immeasurables, the liberations, the spheres of mastery, the spheres of totality, the unhindered knowledges, the superknowledges, and the analytical knowledges.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa thob par byed pa'i rgyu ni 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa thob par byed pa'i rgyu ni 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yin no //
translated: The attainment of the vehicle of the sravakas is the wholesome roots of the mundane path, of the path of application, and of the path of vision.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thob pa ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thob pa ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: The attainment of the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas is, in brief, threefold:

original: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob pa sngon du btang ba dang ; rtogs pa sngon du btang ba dang sngon du ma btang ba'o //🔽de la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob pa sngon du btang ba ni dang por byang chub kyi theg par sems bskyed nas nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bzhi thob pa la brten nas slob pa'i sa bdun po gang
analyzed: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob pa sngon du btang ba dang ; rtogs pa sngon du btang ba dang sngon du ma btang ba'o // de la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob pa sngon du btang ba ni dang por byang chub kyi theg par sems bskyed nas nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bzhi thob pa la brten nas slob pa'i sa bdun po gang
translated: Those who have previously obtained the factors conducive to penetrative insight, those who have previously realized the truths, and those who have not previously realized the truths.

original: yang mi thob par thal byung du mi slob pa'i sa rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu nyid thob pa ste /🔽de ni 'jig rten pa'i sa dang mi slob pa'i sa ni med pa yin no //
analyzed: yang mi thob par thal byung du mi slob pa'i sa rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu nyid thob pa ste / de ni 'jig rten pa'i sa dang mi slob pa'i sa ni med pa yin no //
translated: Those who have previously obtained the factors conducive to penetrative insight first generate the enlightenment mind in the vehicle of the solitary realizers, then obtain the four roots of virtue that are conducive to penetrative insight, and then obtain the result of a solitary realizer without obtaining the seven levels of training.

original: mngon par rtogs pa sngon du btang ba ni dang por rang byang chub kyi theg par sems bskyed nas nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bzhi yang thob ;
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa sngon du btang ba ni dang por rang byang chub kyi theg par sems bskyed nas nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bzhi yang thob ;
translated: Those who have previously realized the truths first generate the enlightenment mind in the vehicle of the solitary realizers, then obtain the four roots of virtue that are conducive to penetrative insight, and then obtain the result of a solitary realizer without obtaining the seven levels of training.🔽Those who have not previously realized the truths first generate the enlightenment mind in the vehicle of the solitary realizers, then obtain the four roots of virtue that are conducive to penetrative insight, and then obtain the result of a solitary realizer without obtaining the seven levels of training.

original: slob pa'i sa bdun po dag mngon par rtogs pa yang 'thob pa la brten nas mi slob pa'i sa rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu nyid thob pa ste /
analyzed: slob pa'i sa bdun po dag mngon par rtogs pa yang 'thob pa la brten nas mi slob pa'i sa rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu nyid thob pa ste /
translated: They attain the level of no learning, the result of pratyekabuddha enlightenment, in dependence on attaining manifest realization of the seven levels of learning.

original: de ni 'jig rten pa'i sa dang slob pa'i sa dang mi slob pa'i sa gsum char yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni 'jig rten pa'i sa dang slob pa'i sa dang mi slob pa'i sa gsum char yod pa yin no //
translated: That is the three levels: the mundane level, the level of learning and the level of no learning.

original: sngon du ma btang ba ni dang por rang byang chub kyi theg par sems bskyed nas thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de nyid la brten nas bskal pa brgyar tshogs bsags te /🔽nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa yang mi slob pa'i sa yang mi thob par thal byung /
analyzed: sngon du ma btang ba ni dang por rang byang chub kyi theg par sems bskyed nas thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de nyid la brten nas bskal pa brgyar tshogs bsags te / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa yang mi slob pa'i sa yang mi thob par thal byung /
translated: Those who do not previously enter the vehicle of pratyekabuddhas first generate the enlightenment mind and in dependence on that generate the root of virtue that is compatible with liberation, they accumulate the accumulations for one hundred eons.🔽They do not attain the level of no learning, the result of pratyekabuddha enlightenment.

original: mi slob pa'i sa rang byang chub kyi snying po 'bras bu nyid thob pa ste /
analyzed: mi slob pa'i sa rang byang chub kyi snying po 'bras bu nyid thob pa ste /
translated: They attain the level of no learning, the result of pratyekabuddha enlightenment, the essence of pratyekabuddha enlightenment.

original: de ni 'jig @133a * //
analyzed: de ni 'jig @133a * //
translated: That is the three levels: the mundane level, the level of learning and the level of no learning.

original: rten pa'i sa thar ba'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mi slob pa'i sa ni yod la 'jig rten pa'i sa nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang slob pa'i sa ni med pa yin no //
analyzed: rten pa'i sa thar ba'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mi slob pa'i sa ni yod la 'jig rten pa'i sa nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang slob pa'i sa ni med pa yin no //
translated: The stage of support is the stage of the root of the wholesome which is favorable to liberation and the stage of the adept. The stage of the mundane sphere is not that which is favorable to penetration and the stage of the learner is not that.

original: de la dang po gnyis kyis ni rang rgyal ba tshogs dang spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la dang po gnyis kyis ni rang rgyal ba tshogs dang spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: By means of the first two, one becomes a solitary-realizer who is in a group and who is active.

original: tha mas ni bse ru lta bur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha mas ni bse ru lta bur 'gyur ro //
translated: By means of the last, one becomes a solitary-realizer who is like a rhinoceros.

original: theg pa chen po thob pa ni rnam pa brgyad de /
analyzed: theg pa chen po thob pa ni rnam pa brgyad de /
translated: The attainment of the Great Vehicle is of eight kinds:

original: sems bskyed pa thob pa dang / snying rje thob pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po thob pa dang / sa thob pa dang / dpag tu med pa lnga las de bzhin nyid khong du chud pa thob pa dang /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa thob pa dang / snying rje thob pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po thob pa dang / sa thob pa dang / dpag tu med pa lnga las de bzhin nyid khong du chud pa thob pa dang /
translated: attainment of the generation of the resolve, attainment of compassion, attainment of the perfections, attainment of the means of gathering disciples, attainment of the stages, attainment of the realization of thusness from among the five immeasurables,

original: mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thob pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thob pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: attainment of the inconceivable powers, and attainment of the unshared qualities of a Buddha.

original: de la bshad pa ni mdor ba sdu na gnas gsum gyis bsdus pa yin te /
analyzed: de la bshad pa ni mdor ba sdu na gnas gsum gyis bsdus pa yin te /
translated: The explanation of that is, in brief, subsumed under three topics:

original: sde snod bsdu pa dang / ma ma bsdu ba dang / de gnyi ga bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: sde snod bsdu pa dang / ma ma bsdu ba dang / de gnyi ga bsdu ba'o //
translated: the collection of the scriptural collections, the collection of mothers, and the collection of both of those.

original: de la sde snod bsdu ba ni nyan thos kyi sde snod dang / theg pa chen po'i sde snod do ;🔽/ ma mo bsdu ba ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa bcu bdun dang / de'i bsdu ba bzhi ste /
analyzed: de la sde snod bsdu ba ni nyan thos kyi sde snod dang / theg pa chen po'i sde snod do ; / ma mo bsdu ba ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa bcu bdun dang / de'i bsdu ba bzhi ste /
translated: The collection of the scriptural collections is the śrāvaka scriptural collection and the Mahāyāna scriptural collection.🔽The collection of mothers is the seventeen levels of the Yogācāra and the four summaries of those.

original: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa bcu bdun ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga dang ldan pa'i sa dang / yid kyi sa dang / rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi sa dang /
